name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Previously, an American "TikTok refugee" commented on Xiaohongshu that he worked in construction and earned $50 per hour. After that, the comment was deleted. Some netizens reminded him not to discuss salary again, otherwise there would be a risk of account suspension. At present, his account has been banned by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Giy02H5bsAA47IR.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The editorial board of the Wall Street Journal severely criticized Trump for launching a trade war with Canada, Mexico, and China: the stupidest trade war in history.
The report pointed out that Trump launched a tariff offensive against Canada and Mexico, and they will be subject to a 25% border tax, while the real opponent China will be subject to a 10% tariff.
Putting China aside, Trump's reasons for economic attacks on neighboring countries are completely unconvincing. He said that the purpose of imposing tariffs on Canada and Mexico is to solve the fentanyl crisis in the United States, but now it seems that fentanyl is just an excuse, and tariffs are not a means. Tariffs themselves are Trump's purpose.
The report emphasized that even if economic analysis is put aside, according to the US-Mexico-Canada trade agreement signed by Trump during his first presidency, the imposition of tariffs should not have happened. Trump tore up the agreement with his friends and ignored the obligation to fulfill the treaty, "which will make other countries more inclined to refuse to reach an agreement with the United States." 
...
fullContent:
华尔街日报编辑委员会严厉批评特朗普发动与加、墨、的贸易战：历史上最愚蠢的贸易战。
 报导指出，特朗普向加拿大和墨西哥发动关税攻势，他们将被征收 25% 的边境税，而真正的对手中国将被征收10%的关税。
 撇开中国不谈，特朗普对邻国进行经济攻击的理由完全无法令人信服， 他称向加墨开征关税是为了解决美国芬太尼危机，但是如今看起来，芬太尼只是借口，关税并非手段，关税本身就是特朗普的目的。
 报导强调，即使撇开经济分析不谈，根据特朗普在他第一次总统任期内签署的美墨加贸易协定，开征关税这件事也不应该发生，特朗普撕毁了与朋友之间的协议，无视履行条约的义务，「这会让其他国家更倾向于拒绝与美国达成协议」。 
 但如果北美贸易战持续下去，它将成为历史上最愚蠢的贸易战之一。」

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump posted on social media that he hopes Canada will become the 51st state of the United States.
"We spend hundreds of billions of dollars every year to subsidize Canada. Why? There is no reason. We don't need anything from them. We have unlimited energy, should make our own cars, and we have more wood than we can use.
Without this huge subsidy, Canada will not be able to continue to exist as a competitive country. Although it sounds harsh, it is true!
Therefore, Canada should become our cherished 51st state. In this way, they can enjoy lower taxes and better military protection-and no tariffs!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 2, Hebei. A retired soldier posted a video saying that he had served for more than ten years, had been awarded many times for meritorious service, and had led many soldiers, but he could not save his son who was lured to Cambodia. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886089632330448896/pu/img/tZmu2eBnKWZj5OjO.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhang Chi, from Zunyi, Guizhou, previously worked in the construction industry in China, and achieved an output value of tens of millions in just a few years. However, the real estate market has been down in recent years, and the intrigues in the engineering industry have caused the company to suffer heavy losses and debts, so he came to Russia to join the army to repay his debts. He said that he has repaid nearly half of his debts, and said that even if he died in battle, the pension would be used to repay the workers' wages and material fees. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886094589930708992/pu/img/JLd5I93-C-pNC9LS.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 2, Xi'an, Shaanxi. A man said he found an additional ICBC personal pension account under his name. After checking, he learned that during the epidemic, the community collected residents' information on the grounds of epidemic prevention and provided it to the ICBC Taihua Road Branch to open a personal pension account. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886127806373089280/pu/img/aetJbI2e7BYYA0Zj.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"For me, the memories of high school are like a bitter dream."
"This place is not like a school, but like a prison. Some people may miss high school, but they are just missing the comradeship of going through difficult times with their classmates."
"I don't mean to compare the suffering, but when people focus on the four provinces, they might as well take a look at the current situation of middle schools in areas with backward educational resources... Although my voice is insignificant, I firmly believe that there will be a day of change." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi0pzEKXIAAtiwF.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 2, a man said that he said in a Douyin live broadcast room: "China's 2,000 years of history is actually a period of history that has been repeated more than 20 times." As a result, the live broadcast room was banned by the platform. He said that "Chinese history has become a banned topic on Douyin" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886281861938479104/pu/img/sFgYU-s2aYRBQSAJ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Panama announces withdrawal from Belt and Road Initiative after drawing a line with China.
Panamanian President Mulino said Panama will not renew the memorandum of understanding on China's Belt and Road Initiative, and hinted that the agreement with China may end early. He announced the decision at a press conference after meeting with US Secretary of State Rubio.
CNN quoted Mulino as saying that Panama will seek cooperation with the United States on new investments in infrastructure projects and other areas. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi2b371aMAAIh86.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Someone posted an anti-corruption propaganda illustration on social media, which prompted some netizens to make remarks against the tower: "I am Deng Xiaoping (Deng Xiaoping) in Beiping. I will flatten all the students and old people." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi2hY1ybYAAUx6N.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Criminal defense lawyer Cai Ya: It is almost impossible to get the court to find the defendant not guilty and to get them to admit that they made a mistake in handling the case and apologize and compensate. Cai Ya said that in a recent case, the defendant's charges were not established at all and the defendant refused to plead guilty, so the public security, procuratorate and court found a few more charges that were not true and asked the lawyer to do ideological work for the defendant, hoping that the defendant would admit his mistakes first, so that they could back down. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886344683603050496/pu/img/MUbPRwOzMXS3C-34.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CCTV.com, February 1: Since the new era, under the guidance of Xi Jinping's cultural thought, the inheritance and development of China's excellent traditional culture has shown a new look and created a new situation. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi2mqYgaEAA_q1J.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 3, Hanzhong, Shaanxi. A street performer said that he was injured in a gas explosion while working in a mine in Bagong Town, Jincheng City in 2000. He was kicked out of the hospital by the mine owner, who also bribed the court. He is now homeless and helpless. He asked the government to investigate the facts. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi2opshasAAjchO.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 31, a UP host on Bilibili conducted a statistical survey on the phone models of Weibo big V fans. Among the fans of "Feng Ge Fu Ming Tian Ya", the proportion of using Apple phones is the highest.
Among the fans of "Gu Yan Mu Chan", the proportion of using Huawei phones is the highest. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi2uaS7aUAAOBr0.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: U.S. Embassy in China: China plays a central role in the fentanyl crisis that is claiming American lives. In fact, the CCP subsidizes Chinese chemical companies that export fentanyl. China has not only failed to curb the source of illegal drugs, but has actively encouraged such business. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi2xoywbAAAJci1.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 2, an automotive engineer posted a video explaining why she recommends everyone to buy Tesla instead of Xiaomi su7. She said that each car must undergo reliability testing before mass sales, a process that takes a lot of time and requires consistency certification. However, it only took three years for su7 to go from research and development to mass production, and the reliability test was pushed to consumers for trial and error. Tesla sold 1.79 million vehicles worldwide last year, and has been iterated and market-proven. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886362757899137024/pu/img/np13tGMIfSChoAAs.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 3, Taiwanese actress, singer, and host Barbie Hsu (Big S) died of influenza-related pneumonia at the age of 48. Lei Jun posted a message to mourn Big S, which was questioned and dissatisfied by some netizens. Some netizens believed that Big S was a "Taiwan independence" supporter and Lei Jun should not mourn her. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi28HE4aQAAaOW8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Canadian Chamber of Commerce predicts the losses of the mutual tariffs between the United States and Canada:
Canada: GDP is expected to shrink by about 2.6%, equivalent to a loss of about 78 billion Canadian dollars, and per capita annual income will decrease by about 1,900 Canadian dollars.
United States: GDP is expected to decline by about 1.6%, equivalent to a loss of about 467 billion US dollars, and per capita income will decrease by about 1,300 US dollars. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi2-Qwra4AApQDQ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a picture of a "neighborhood supervision studio" was circulated on the Internet. The address in the picture is Zhenhai Community, Zhonghua Street, Siming District.
Public information shows that neighborhood supervisors are a team composed of discipline inspection and supervision cadres at all levels, party style and political style supervisors, and resident representatives. Their duties are to supervise the things that people hear, see, and do around them on a daily basis. Last year, many street communities in Fujian successively carried out neighborhood supervision work. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3AB7yboAE0Xwq.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Vietnamese people have a reunion dinner on New Year's Eve, and the highlight is watching the "Kitchen God" known as the "Vietnamese Spring Festival Gala". The various gods played by actors report to the Jade Emperor on the major and minor events of the past year, praising those who deserve praise and scolding those who deserve criticism (mainly humorous and sarcastic). This year's program mentioned the reform of state-owned enterprises and government departments, veteran cadres serving as both referees and contestants, traffic chaos, etc. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3G9vJbcAA1VoM.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Wall Street Journal: Beijing is preparing to propose a preliminary plan to avoid further tariffs from the Trump administration. China's economy is particularly weak, and leader Xi Jinping has hinted that he is interested in negotiating with US President Trump. Trump has also hinted at a willingness to talk and postponed most of the promised tariffs on China.
The report mentioned that China promised to invest more in the United States (such as in areas such as electric vehicle batteries), not to devalue the yuan to gain a competitive advantage, and to reduce exports of fentanyl precursors. Beijing is also said to intend to treat the TikTok deal as essentially a "commercial issue" and allow ByteDance to sell TikTok to interested US bidders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump's executive order requires tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China, and stipulates that the "small exemption rule" for small packages will no longer apply. This move will have an impact and impact on Chinese e-commerce companies Alibaba, JD.com, Pinduoduo's Temu and Shein.
Under the exemption regulations, products below $800 can enter the United States duty-free. This is a good thing for Chinese e-commerce companies because they usually ship cheaper goods directly to American consumers.
In the first nine months of last year, American shoppers and companies used this loophole to import about $48 billion worth of goods from around the world.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Russian Satellite News Agency: Russian experts said that China has the ability to deal with US tariffs without damaging its own economic development. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3W1oSa8AAN8lh.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Someone shared on Xiaohongshu that he had officially become a U.S. citizen. In the comment section, some netizens reminded him not to forget to cancel his Chinese household registration. Some netizens took screenshots and reported to the grid staff of the street office, and said that the police station would cooperate in the investigation tomorrow. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3T08Xa4AAkI-A.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shandong Province issued the "Action Plan on Promoting Housing Consumption": Intensify the crackdown on spreading false statements, maliciously badmouthing the real estate market, and other behaviors to create a good public opinion atmosphere. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3aTyKbkAAh5VR.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
So far, 
105 schools have less than 10 days of winter vacation, 34 schools have less than 7 days, and 5 schools have less than 2 days. 
The average monthly vacation days of these schools is 2.97 days, 5% of schools have no more than 2 days of monthly vacation, and 75% of schools have less than 4 days of monthly vacation. 
A total of 152 schools have student suicides, accounting for 42.34% of all schools. 
In terms of the number of schools on the "Shame List", the top five provinces are: Shandong (45 schools), Henan (36 schools), Guangdong (27 schools), Hebei (26 schools) and Zhejiang (22 schools).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After a Chinese student in the United States questioned the school's principal about why the school celebrated the Spring Festival with the Lunar New Year, the principal thought he was too radical and emotional and decided not to celebrate the festival anymore. The student was puzzled and frustrated by this and questioned the school's lack of cultural tolerance. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3eIIWaYAETwIm.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guizhou Radio and Television: Li Qiang from Jiangxi spent 1,800 yuan to find two pieces of porcelain at the antique market. He resold them due to financial difficulties during the epidemic. As the porcelain was a third-level cultural relic, the prosecutor brought a public prosecution against him for the crime of forced reselling of third-level cultural relics.
Lawyer: Cultural relics are precious wealth, and the legal red line cannot be touched. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3g7bAaEAAutTA.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In a recent radio interview, U.S. Secretary of State Rubio called North Korea and Iran "rogue states that must be dealt with" and said that these two countries need special attention when formulating foreign policy.
North Korea criticized Rubio for his nonsense. The North Korean Foreign Ministry said on Monday: "We will not tolerate any provocation from the United States... We will take severe countermeasures as always."
This is the first time that North Korea has publicly condemned the new Trump administration. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3k8WIbQAA1Q-9.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Teacher Fu Yingjun of Nanjing University of Media and Communications organized a Spring Festival Gala for college students. Because the gala contained clips and lines that the school leaders believed "lacked positive energy", Teacher Fu Yingjun was interviewed by the school leaders. The gala program was also required to be deleted and revised. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3pz8xboAAFR-8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hong Kong's retail sales value fell by 9.7% year-on-year in December last year
Official provisional estimates show that Hong Kong's retail sales value has fallen for 10 consecutive months year-on-year, with the decline widening to 9.7% in December last year and a sharp drop of 7.3% in 2024. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi3uHK3bMAAwzQG.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 2, a blogger talked about the logic and good and evil of the Little Pinks: An old man was beaten to the ground by a group of young men. As long as you are not a pervert, you will definitely think that the young men are doing bad things. But if the incident happened in China and the old man was wearing a kimono, there would definitely be many people applauding the young men's behavior.
The blogger believes that in the world of pinks, there are only positions and enemies, but no distinction between good and evil. Logic is a poison to them. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886427594549334016/pu/img/MDP4z-_XPqbBEqNp.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 1, a multi-vehicle collision occurred on the Taihui Expressway in Henan Province due to slippery and icy roads. The video shows that many people stood on the expressway and waved to stop the cars, but it was still useless. Some people were injured and unconscious. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886437928399933440/pu/img/S_xQyY7BV4Iwrwth.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: RT @xROx8964: Following yesterday’s post, let’s continue to talk about Deepseek, especially the part about censorship. Deepseek censorship may be the most discussed topic on China Twitter. Pink friends may think that censorship is no big deal, after all, Deepseek is a technology product that carries the destiny of the country x, while some anti-traitor friends may think that censorship is a big deal…
